description: Multiple invoices (Hong Kong Printing Centre to Hyakunousha)

items.description: A invoice (Hong Kong Printing Centre to Hyakunousha)

issuer_info.description: An object that contains Issuer or Supplier Information (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

company_name.description: An object that contains Issuer or Supplier company name (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

text.description: A string of the Issuer or Supplier company name (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

source.description: A string to describe the source of Issuer or Supplier company name (Hong Kong Printing Centre) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

company_address.description: An object that contains Issuer or Supplier company address (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

text.description: A string of Issuer or Supplier company address (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

source.description: A string to describe the source of Issuer or Supplier company address (Hong Kong Printing Centre) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

contact_phone.description: An object that contains Issuer or Supplier company contact phone (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

text.description: A string of Issuer or Supplier company contact phone  (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

source.description: A string to describe the source of Issuer or Supplier company contact phone  (Hong Kong Printing Centre) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

statement_date.description: An object that contains the statement date (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

text.description: A string of the statement date (Hong Kong Printing Centre)

source.description: A string to describe the statement date (Hong Kong Printing Centre) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

receiver_info.description: An object that contains Receiver or Customer Information (Hyakunousha)

company_id.description: An object that contains Receiver or Customer company id (Hyakunousha)

text.description: A string of the Receiver or Customer company id (Hyakunousha)

source.description: A string to describe the source of Receiver or Customer company id (Hyakunousha) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

company_name.description: An object that contains Receiver or Customer company name (Hyakunousha)

text.description: A string of the Receiver or Customer company name (Hyakunousha)

source.description: A string to describe the source of Receiver or Customer company name (Hyakunousha) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

company_address.description: An object that contains Receiver or Customer company address (Hyakunousha)

text.description: A string of the Receiver or Customer company address (Hyakunousha)

source.description: A string to describe the source of Receiver or Customer company address (Hyakunousha) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

fax.description: An object that contains the fax number in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

text.description: A string of fax number in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

source.description: A string to describe the source of fax number in Receiver or Customer company address (Hyakunousha) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

contact_person.description: An object that contains the contact_person in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

text.description: A string of contact_person in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

source.description: A string to describe the source of contact_person in Receiver or Customer company address (Hyakunousha) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

recipient.description: An object that contains the recipient in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

text.description: A string of recipient in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

source.description: A string to describe the source of recipient in Receiver or Customer company address (Hyakunousha) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

recipient_contact.description: An object that contains the recipient contact phone in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

text.description: A string of recipient contact phone in Receiver or Customer company (Hyakunousha)

source.description: A string to describe the source of recipient contact phone in Receiver or Customer company address (Hyakunousha) is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

details.description: An object that contains all details in this invoice

items.description: An object that contains 1 row of detail in this invoice

date.description: An object that contains the date column of that row

text.description: A string of the date column of that row

source.description: A string to describe the date column of that row is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

ref.description: An object that contains the ref column of that row

text.description: A string of the ref column of that row

source.description: A string to describe the ref of that row column is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

desc.description: An object that contains the description column of that row

text.description: A string of the description column of that row

source.description: A string to describe the description column of that row is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

quantity.description: An object that contains the qty column of that row, it should be a number only

text.description: A string of the qty column of that row, it should be a number only

source.description: A string to describe the qty column of that row is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

amt.description: An object that contains the amount column of that row

text.description: A string of the amount column of that row

source.description: A string to describe the amount column of that row is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

service_period.description: An object that contains the service period in this invoice, (0 - 30 / 31 - 60 / 61 - 90 / Over 90 days)

text.description: A string of the service period in this invoice, (0 - 30 / 31 - 60 / 61 - 90 / Over 90 days)

source.description: A string to describe the service period in this invoice is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

currency.description: An object that contains the currency for total amount in this invoice, it should be currency abbreviations in 3 charaters

text.description: A string of the currency for total amount in this invoice, it should be currency abbreviations in 3 charaters

source.description: A string to describe the currency for total amount in this invoice is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'

total_amount.description: An object that contains the total amount in this invoice

text.description: A string of the total amount in this invoice

source.description: A string to describe the total amount in this invoice is handwritten or not, it should be 'handwritten' or 'non-handwritten'
